mapper.select: select cc.user_id,cc.name,cc.goods_gubun, case when cc.goods_gubun = 1 then '예금' when cc.goods_gubun = 2 then '펀드' when cc.goods_gubun = 3 then '외화' when cc.goods_gubun = 4 then '주식' else ' ' end as goods_gubun_nm, cc.cnt from ( select bb.user_id,bb.name,bb.goods_gubun,count(bb.goods_gubun) cnt from ( select aa.user_id,aa.name,aa.account_no,aa.seq_no,aa.goods_gubun, aa.goods_code, aa.goods_name,aa.period_mm,aa.provider_code,aa.tran_unit, aa.mangi_date,aa.invest_gubun from ( select a.user_id,a.name, b.account_no,c.goods_code,c.seq_no,d.goods_gubun,d.goods_name,d.provider_code,d.tran_unit, d.period_mm,d.invest_gubun, case when d.goods_gubun = 1 then to_char((SELECT ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, d.period_mm) FROM dual),'YYYYMMDD') else ' ' end as mangi_date, case when d.goods_gubun = 1 then (select interest_rate from interestrate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and period_mm = d.period_mm and status = 1) when d.goods_gubun = 2 then (select trbase_price from baseprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and status = 1) when d.goods_gubun = 3 then (select exchange_rate from exchangerate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and seq_no = (select max(seq_no) from exchangerate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and status = 1)) when d.goods_gubun = 4 then (select stock_price from stockprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and seq_no = (select max(seq_no) from stockprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and status = 1)) else 0 end as curprice from customer_mas a,account_mas b,basketlist_his c,goods_mas d where b.ref_status = 1 and a.user_id = b.user_id and a.user_id = c.user_id and c.status = 1 and c.goods_code = d.goods_code ) aa ) bb group by bb.user_id,bb.name,bb.goods_gubun ) cc where cc.user_id = #{user_id} order by goods_gubun

mapper.select: select a.goods_gubun, case when a.goods_gubun = 1 then '예금' when a.goods_gubun = 2 then '펀드' when a.goods_gubun = 3 then '외화' when a.goods_gubun = 4 then '주식' else ' ' end as goods_gubun_nm, a.goods_code,a.goods_name,a.provider_code,b.codevalue_cmmt provider_nm, a.tran_unit,a.period_mm,a.invest_gubun, case when a.goods_gubun = 1 then (select nvl(max(interest_rate),0) from interestrate_his where goods_code = a.goods_code and period_mm = a.period_mm and status = 1) when a.goods_gubun = 2 then (select nvl(max(trbase_price),0) from baseprice_his where goods_code = a.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and status = 1) when a.goods_gubun = 3 then (select nvl(max(exchange_rate),0) from exchangerate_his where goods_code = a.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and seq_no = (select nvl(max(seq_no),0) from exchangerate_his where goods_code = a.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and status = 1)) when a.goods_gubun = 4 then (select nvl(max(stock_price),0) from stockprice_his where goods_code = a.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and seq_no = (select nvl(max(seq_no),0) from stockprice_his where goods_code = a.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') and status = 1)) else 0 end as befprice from goods_mas a,code_val b where a.goods_code = #{goods_code} and b.code_gubun = 'bnk_gubun' and b.code_value = a.provider_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interestrate_his (goods_code,period_mm,status,interest_rate) VALUES ( #{goods_code}, (select (period_mm) from goods_mas where goods_code = #{goods_code}), 1, #{tr_price} )

INSERT INTO exchangerate_his (goods_code,base_date,seq_no,status,exchange_rate) VALUES ( #{goods_code}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), (select (nvl(max(seq_no),0)+1) from exchangerate_his where goods_code = #{goods_code} and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')), 1, #{tr_price} )

INSERT INTO stockprice_his (goods_code,base_date,seq_no,status,tran_datetime,stock_price) VALUES ( #{goods_code}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), (select (nvl(max(seq_no),0)+1) from stockprice_his where goods_code = #{goods_code} and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')), 1, sysdate, #{tr_price} )
